body.name: OXO Good Grips Microwave Egg Cooker ,White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 7 hrs 48 mins
features: Make scrambled or fried eggs for breakfast sandwiches in a minute or less
Curved bottom helps center yolk for fried eggs
Base is removable for easy transfer directly to bread or plate
Wide opening allows for whisking directly in Cooker
Handle stays cool for easy removal from microwave
BPA free, microwave and dishwasher safe
body.description: At OXO, we believe microwaves are for more than just reheating food. We developed our line of microwave products for busy cooks who want to make healthy meals and snacks - quickly, easily, and without a mess. Premium materials mean better results, and thoughtful touches like stay-cool handles and easy adjustments let you customize your meal just the way you like it. Make scrambled or fried eggs in 30-60 seconds Weekday breakfast leaving you cold? Our Microwave Egg Cooker lets you make scrambled or fried eggs for breakfast sandwiches (and more!) in a minute or less. With a curved bottom to help center the yolk for fried eggs, a wide opening for whisking scrambled eggs right in the Cooker, stay-cool handles for grabbing right from the microwave, and a removable base to easily transfer your eggs to bread or plate - you'll be making hot, eggs-ellent breakfast in a flash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Excellent product. Easy to use. Cook fast 1 minute maximum. No more burning fingers because you can easily hold it out of the microwave without problem. Dishwasher safe. Excellent price. Very well packaged and the delivery was fast. I will purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for 1 or 2 large eggs & microwave
reviews.reviewText: First of all - this is based on the eggs sizes found in USA marketing.Now my Dad raised fowl, from peacocks to pigeons. I don't think this would hold a peacock egg and might hold 5 or 6 pigeons eggs.BUTCrack 1 or 2 eggs into container, stir, pop in microwave (setting depends on your microwave), pull out,Egg slides out easily. Nice round egg to put on muffin or whatever,Cooker cleans easily, quick swish with towel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cooks perfect eggs sized rught
reviews.reviewText: Easy to clean and works as expected

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use, somewhat easy to clean, somtimes explode though
reviews.reviewText: It's super easy to use. I normally spray some oil before adding the egg to it, this way it's much easier to clean. However, there have been a few times that the egg exploded in the microwave - i didn't set a longer timer or anything. Not sure what caused some eggs to explode and some were fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable, Easy to use, Easy to clean - highly recommend!
reviews.reviewText: I like having a hot breakfast at work, so I've been spending $3.00+ a pop on those Jimmy Dean Simple Scrambles. While still cheaper than buying take out, I realized how much this was quickly adding up and started to look up microwave egg cookers. After some research I ordered the OXO brand. I'm very happy with this product!Yes, technically one could use a bowl to cook my eggs, but I prefer this because it's easier to clean, it disassembles and it has a vented lid.To address some of the negative reviews:1) I have been using this almost daily for a month and there have been no leaks whatsoever. Also, I have cooked up to three eggs at a time and the bottom has never popped out.2) I have put this in the dishwasher a few times and nothing has warped.3) Nothing sticks to the bottom, I do get a scant amount of egg residue on the middle ring that easily wipes away with a sponge (although for full transparency, I have only cooked scrambled eggs in the container)3) Your eggs will cook quickly (I check my eggs around the 50 second mark, add cheese and cook more about 20-30 more seconds) - I don't advise to put them in the microwave then walking away.If anything changes, I will amend my review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These egg cookers are fabulous and I have tried 2 other brands. These do not leak eggs through the bottom, they cook very evenly and cooked eggs come out perfect and easily!Would so recommend them and buy them again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Make Breakfast Egg Sandwiches At Home
reviews.reviewText: I use this to make English muffin breakfast sandwiches at home. Crack a couple of eggs in the Egg Cooker, light mixing of the eggs, season and microwave. The way the top and bottom separate make for easy removal of the egg which makes for such quick and ease of use. Also, with the ease of separation of pieces makes for easy clean up either by hand or in the dishwasher.If you are an "English Muffin Egg Sandwich" lover, get this and make your own!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a great product
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this to cook the egg for my homemade breakfast egg muffin sandwich. It does a great job and it is the right size. You do need to coat the bottom with either a cooking spray or butter (I use butter). This step isn't necessary for the egg to slide off the bottom plate, but it does help tremendously in allowing the egg to release cleanly off the bottom plate. I did try using it for scrambled eggs and honestly because you have to stop and stir the eggs midway through the cooking process it isn't really a time saver. It makes a better omelet than scrambled egg. I just scramble my eggs the traditional way in a skillet.
This egg cooker is really good, but actually too expensive for what it is

reviews.reviewTitle: Ideal para fazer ovos no Microondas
reviews.reviewText: Eficiente, material resistente e fácil.de lacar. A única observação é que a parte de baixo solta com muita facilidade, fazendo com que os ovos possam cair acidentalmente.
great for daily use to cook egg

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 19, 2018
reviews.reviewText: These are good little egg cookers that make it almost painless to have a scrambled egg/omlette for breakfast. They are just deep enough to whisk the ingredients in and cook them in one minute (at 900w/one and a half minutes for two eggs), and the cover ensures that you don't have to worry about the roof of your microwave being caked in napalmed egg afterwards. A little oil (sprayed then brushed) around the base also means that they clean pretty much instantly. The finished result is a perfectly round "cake" that fits inside a muffin, bun or mini wrap. I tried to "fry" an egg in it, but it seems you have to constantly check on the state, so, IMO, it isn't really worth the hassle.
